bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu zhi 月水不止， incessant menstruation. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry ma lin 馬藺 : 治婦人血氣煩悶，產後血運並經脈不止，崩中帶下 , “Curesin women vexation and heart-pressure resulting from [stagnant] blood and qi, blood[-induced brain] movements following delivery, and incessant passage through conduit vessels , as well as collapsing center with discharge from below the belt”.
